title: Nick Steinhart from Touche Amore
itunes:title: Nick Steinhart from Touche Amore
description:
Episode 156 - Happy 3 Year Anniversary to the show! Thanks for hanging out on this awesome journey. I couldn't be more happy with how things have developed with the show. You are all beautiful. Nick Steinhardt plays guitar in the band Touche Amore as well as handling all of the visuals attached to his band and many other bands (Balance and Composure, Deafheaven). We had a cup of coffee in his apartment and discussed the creative process, first band experiences and fashion choices. MONTHLY DONATIONONE TIME DONATION

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
